poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
"Beis not ourstudyus to spy a moyt in mine e
That in your awin a ferry boyt can nocht se."
- Gavin Douglas
You were, at most, a mote in my refulgence
Afloat on the briny moat around my eye
Where crocodiles moped and snapped at the importunate
Subtropical moult.
